content: purchasable pdf pattern https //www etsy com/listing/546489335/crochet-grey-gingham-blanket-pattern youtube tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=svi9tehgbza uses the crumpled griddle stitch materials * 1 skein patons beehive baby sport in angel white * 1 skein patons beehive baby sport in baby grey * 2 skeins patons beehive baby sport in baby grey marl * size h 5 00 mm crochet hook * tapestry needle to weave in ends * scissors
